body.p: The package.use.mask file can be used to mask or unmask certain useflags for a given depatom. This is used by the hardened team for example, which uses it to unmask the hardened useflag for sys-devel/gcc. The format is as follows
body.codesample: # General format atom [-]useflag1 [[-]useflag2 [...]] # Real world example sys-devel/gcc -hardened app-text/crm114 mew mimencode test
body.p: This file can be used in subprofiles to mask useflags only for certain setups.
